Notify.target_warn: 🎯 Please select a target format, or we'll confuse the server 😊
Notify.max_files_warn: 📂 Oops! You can convert only {quantity} files at a time!
Notify.max_size_warn: 📏 Maximum file size is {size}. The file {name} is too heavy! 🐘
Notify.file_type_warn: 📄 The file format {name} is not supported 😢 We're still learning that 😇
Notify.username_warn: 👤 Username cannot be empty. Please enter it!
Notify.convert_error: 😕 Something went wrong with the file conversion. Please try again 😇

DialogCookie.title: 🍪 Cookie Agreement
DialogCookie.content: This site uses cookies to ensure that you get the best possible user experience. By continuing to use this site, you agree to our cookie policy.
